title: Moving Forward: Breaking Down Stigma
description: To dismantle the barriers created by stigma, our coalition is committed to:

list.title: Education and Awareness Campaigns
list.description: Informing the public about the realities of OUD and the importance of empathy and support.

list.title: Advocacy for Policy Changes
list.description: Promoting laws and regulations that protect individuals with OUD, especially in professional and parental contexts.

list.title: Creating Support Networks
list.description: Developing confidential and judgment-free support systems for all individuals affected by OUD

list.title: Encouraging Relapse Understanding
list.description: Fostering a culture that views relapse as a potential step in the recovery journey, not a failure.

summary: Together, we can create a society where individuals with OUD are treated with the respect and dignity they deserve, paving the way for successful recovery and reintegration.
